name: Flick Goalkeeper - Can you stop the soccer ball of a football striker's perfect kick?
name_original: Flick Goalkeeper - Can you stop the soccer ball of a football striker's perfect kick?
description:
You are the goal keeper! Play this free exciting game where you get the chance to stop all these footballs coming at you!

STOP THE BLUE BALL! Watch out for the blue ball that the striker uses. It is extremely fast!

•3D goalkeeper experience
•Amazing soccer stadium sounds
•Beat other people’s scores in the leaderboards
•Awesome graphics

What you are waiting for? Download this FREE game and start SAVING!
